We refer to Wikipedia articles on astronomy for help. The Green comet C/2022 E3 (ZTF) was imaged by many astronomers including Glen who plans to image it tonight using his new CM26 mount and trusty Z61 and MM Pro camera. As he sets up in the garden, an on-screen title reading "C/2022 E3 (ZTF)" should appear.

Therefore, the answer is (A).
A: Crouching on the grassy lawn, carefully fine-tuning a complex camera rig mounted on a tripod in the backyard.
